title: Ocean Week Reef Status (June)
body:
Hey everyone,

I want to provide an update on the Artificial Reef project as well as give you all an idea of what the road to completion looks like. I’m going to leave this stickied until the next update, so everyone has a clear understanding of how the reef is progressing. 

The graphic below outlines the broad steps we need to go through before the reef is ready. It’s impossible to commit to time frames, because a lot depends on iteration and working with various partners including government agencies.

http://i.imgur.com/m46kayX.jpg

The good news is, we’ve found a suitable site! We’re not ready to talk about where it is just yet, because we need to check a few permit boxes first. The site meets all the criteria though, so fingers crossed!

We’re not sure exactly how long the permit process will take. It’s super important we make sure your efforts have a positive impact on the environment, and that will take time. Once we’re done with the permits we’ll design the reef, then work with our partners to build it, then deploy it to its permanent home.

If you have any questions about the process then let us know in the comments below!

{{champion:111}}

replies.body: What exactly are you doing?
We raised enough points to have a LoL themed artificial reef built in the ocean somewhere to celebrate ocean week
where is going to be placed? and will there be a event when it is finish?

We're hoping to be able to give more detailed information on the location with next update.

When the reef is finished and in place we'll definitely want to do something so everyone can enjoy the moment,  but we don't know what yet. One step at a time ;-)
10000 free RP sounds about right to me
Sounds pretty cheeky to me!
how about a free ocean champ+skin COUGHoceskinCOUGH
If only you put this much effort into the OCE skin

Understandable comment but unfortunately with the skin, effort isn't the only factor, we need to work with other teams and guidelines. Between everyone in the team I couldn't even begin to count the hours we've spent working on the the skin. But we haven't given up, and are planning an update shortly!

Oh, and your Summoner name is awesome because it's also my nickname :-)
Skin? What skin for OCE?

whenever riot adds a new server region they add a skin themed for that region (for example glaive warrior pantheon is for the Romanian servers, modeled after the Dacian soldiers)

When OCE was added they never released a skin for that region... they said a LONG time ago (like a year or so) they would have an update on the skin but never did... 

but I guess that changes now?
Outback Renekton ffs, rito just need to say that's the skin for OCE, problem solved
Besides that being basically a Australian skin and not Oceanic.
Maybe a reef themed skin to commemorate this event!

This might sound shocking but as much as I love skins and sadly have many of them, is it not super cool to be able to go dive someday and see a Artificial Reef based on a game you play/played? +1 for OCE. seems like a fun server event wise!
or just so archaeologists can dig it up 500 years from now and be like... wtf?{{champion:111}}
Can someone tell me who the reef is going to modeled after? Many thanks to the kind soul that does.

Players voted between Nami, Fizz and Nautilus.

The clear winner was {{champion:111}}
I still think Nami would have looked cooler.
I voted for Nami :-(
this fits with Naut lore (and yeah I voted for mermaid in the sea)

Hey, I was just wondering which genera of corals will you be using? Will you be using specifically grown corals or local fragments? Have you looked at any literature on successful artificial reefs?

I don't want to sound rude or patronising, I am just very interested in the success of a reef based from League and I was wondering how much thought had gone into it. Since about 50% of artificial reefs fail and many having little success, and this is one I'd like to see flourish.

Great question! 

Basically what we do is design a structure that will foster marine life on its own, then let the ocean work it out. The design will likely be made out of cement (it's not harmful to the environment) and will have lots of holes, crevices, etc for life to grow. By taking that approach, life grows that is suitable to the local environment. 

We've done a bunch of research and spoken to professors, marine biologists, all sorts of people who have given us advice. It is by far the strangest project I've ever worked on!
Can you tell us how many summoner names are going to be on the statue and/or give us a list while we wait? :) keen to confirm I'm on it!

I had wanted to include the list of names in the update, but it was taking time and I wanted to get the update out sooner rather than later. There are a lot of people who were clever with tasteless and offensive (I'm hard to offend, but wow!!) we need to remove first.

My names on the list.
I didn't get to play much but im pretty sure I won 6+ games.

But still, on a fookin statue "under dah sea" is gonna have our names on it.
Gonna be amazing.

Next can we have like a stature of Azir somewhere in the outback XD

I know, I'm super jealous I only got two wins! :-(

Azir in the desert? Where's the environmental value there?? :-p
NOOO THE SAHARA
How do you get your name on this list?
You had to contribute points during ocean week.
How did you contribute points?{{champion:32}}
By winning games during the event
Do u know how many points??

I think (emphasis on "think") you just had to contribute points, no specific number.

EDIT: Ok, went and found [the Ocean Week page](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek/) and you needed to contribute 3+ points to get your summoner name on the statue.

If, totally hypothetically speaking, at the time of the event I didn't like my summoner name and afterwards changed it, which name goes on the statue? It might be kind of selfish but I'd hate for my old account name to be on there.

It's a good question. At the moment we have a list of the summoner names that were attached to the account at the time. It might be possible to give players a chance to change it, but it might not be. I'll have to give this some thought! Good flag though!
Hey Cpt even if u only got one win during ocean week do u still get ur name on the statue??
No, you needed 3 wins to get your name on the statue.
Cool cool coz i had 5 or 6 wins. Ty so much MasterMirkinen
When will this statue be made and put in the ocean? I want to see this statue or at least get info on this project's development so far.
It's all in the update ;-)
am i on de list???
FuriousFlameDude That is
We'll be releasing the list soon! We're just in the process of cleaning it up.
all i ever wanted was  yes or no answer and all i ever gotted was we're just in the process of cleaning it uo
Don't worry we'll get it out asap!
5 months later...
Hey there! We released the list a little while back, you can find it [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community/community-events/nautilus-reef-january-2016-update)

Hey, Riot. I think the idea of an actual Reef that will help the enviroment is super cool. I'd love to go snorkling there once it's done.

But look can we get any hint as to where it is? I really hope it's at least in either Australia or NZ, because it's the OCE server. It would really be upsetting if it's in America.

BTW Riot, you should totally make sure it's around about SE QLD. For, uh, science. ;)
